caption.title: Annual cycle (repeated twice) of the vertical (1000–600 hPa) profile of zonal wind (m/s).
caption.p: Average over the Caribbean Low-Level Jet area (80–70°W, 12–16°N) projected for (a) 2021–2050 and (b) difference of zonal wind between 2021–2050 and 1961–1990 period. Negative values in (a) refer to easterly winds, whereas negative values in (b) indicate strengthening (orange shading) of easterly wind velocity.
